DigitalIOItem.Name: TotalCurrent
DigitalIOItem.Description: Total current value encoded in 0.01A units

DigitalIOItem.Name: StateOfCharge
DigitalIOItem.Description: Estimated state of charge of the battery pack from 0 to 100 Percent.

DigitalIOItem.Name: MinCellTemperature
DigitalIOItem.Description: Temperature of cell with the lowest temperature

DigitalIOItem.Name: MaxCellTemperature
DigitalIOItem.Description: Temperature of cell with the highest temperature

DigitalIOItem.Name: Protection_Overcurrent
DigitalIOItem.Description: Current is above critical maximum

DigitalIOItem.Name: TotalVoltage
DigitalIOItem.Description: Total voltage word of all cells added together, encoded in 0.01V

DigitalIOItem.Name: Protection_Undervoltage
DigitalIOItem.Description: Some cell is below critical minimum voltage

DigitalIOItem.Name: Protection_Overvoltage
DigitalIOItem.Description: Some cell is above critical maximum voltage

DigitalIOItem.Name: Protection_ComErrorModule
DigitalIOItem.Description: No Communication to one of the Modules

DigitalIOItem.Name: Protection_Overtemperature
DigitalIOItem.Description: Cell temperature exceeds maximum critical temperature setting

DigitalIOItem.Name: Protection_FaultMinusContactor
DigitalIOItem.Description: Error with minus Contactor

DigitalIOItem.Name: Protection_FaultPlusContactor
DigitalIOItem.Description: Error with plus Contactor

DigitalIOItem.Name: Protection_SensorBroken
DigitalIOItem.Description: A Current/Voltage sensor is defective.

DigitalIOItem.Name: Warning_PreChargingFailure
DigitalIOItem.Description: No charging is possible.

DigitalIOItem.Name: Warning_Overtemperature
DigitalIOItem.Description: Maximum cell temperature exceeds warning temperature setting.

DigitalIOItem.Name: ReferenceCharge
DigitalIOItem.Description: 1 = Reference Charge is neccessary

DigitalIOItem.Name: Heartbeat
DigitalIOItem.Description: Counts up from 0 to 255 every second.

DigitalIOItem.Name: Warning_Undervoltage
DigitalIOItem.Description: Voltage is below low voltage warning setting.

DigitalIOItem.Name: AIR_Status
DigitalIOItem.Description: 1 = both contactors (+/-) are active

DigitalIOItem.Name: Warning_Overvoltage
DigitalIOItem.Description: Voltage is over high voltage warning setting.

DigitalIOItem.Name: Status
DigitalIOItem.Description: Status of the BMS/Battery. [0 = Error, 1 = Charge, 2 = Discharge]

DigitalIOItem.Name: Warning_Overcurrent
DigitalIOItem.Description: Current is over high current warning setting.

DigitalIOItem.Name: CountdownForShutdown
DigitalIOItem.Description: Timefrom 15sec to 0sec if a Protection Flag switches to 1

DigitalIOItem.Name: EmergencyShutdown
DigitalIOItem.Description: 1 = If the countdown for shutdown reaches zero after a Protection Flag

DigitalIOItem.Name: ErrorModuleNumber
DigitalIOItem.Description: Number of the Module within the Battery who has an error. [0 = no module faulty]

DigitalIOItem.Name: ErrorCodeNumber
DigitalIOItem.Description: Error number from the Module from 1 to 8. [Explanation within the Can Protocol]

DigitalIOItem.Name: NumberOfModules
DigitalIOItem.Description: Identified Number of existing Modules.

DigitalIOItem.Name: MinCellVoltage
DigitalIOItem.Description: Voltage of cell with the lowest voltage. [Offset = 1800mV / Factor = 0,1V]

DigitalIOItem.Name: MaxCellVoltage
DigitalIOItem.Description: Voltage of cell with the highest voltage. [Offset = 1800mV / Factor = 10]

DigitalIOItem.Name: SW_Version_YearMonth
DigitalIOItem.Description: Date if the Software Version. [Month: Bit 0-3 / Year: Bit 4-7]

DigitalIOItem.Name: LoadCycles
DigitalIOItem.Description: Number of load cycles of this battery

DigitalIOItem.Name: OperatingHours
DigitalIOItem.Description: Sum of rounded operating hours

DigitalIOItem.Name: ChargingEnable
DigitalIOItem.Description: 1 = Charging is allowed. 0 = Charging is NOT allowed.

DigitalIOItem.Name: ChargingRelayEnable
DigitalIOItem.Description: Switches the ChargingRelay to enable/disable of the vehicles bottom mounted charging contacts.

IOGroup.Description: This I/O group contains BMS data like StateOfCharge, Current, Voltage, Diagnostic
